duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and implement new software architecture patterns in Cloud that are scalable, secure, and cost-efficient.
Develop Infrastructure as Code (IaC) using CloudFormation templates, YAML files, build specifications, and Python Lambda functions for automated build and release processes.
Implement proactive monitoring and observability to predict and detect abnormal system behaviors, with alerts to avoid system impacts.
Lead in the implementation of standards and best practices on deploying applications in AWS.
Mentor junior Cloud and Software Engineers.
Present new ideas to leadership and present on topics to improve the learning of others.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in computer science, Math, or any Engineering
